content.rendered:
Directed by Villads Spangsberg. Lih Liau. Giancarlo Volpe. Meruan Salim

Written by Aaron Ehasz. Justin Richmond. Joe Corcoran. Eugene Ramos. Michal Schick. Paige VanTassell. Devon Giehl. Iain Hendry. Neil Mukhopadhyay

Cast Paula Burrows( Rayla / …36 episodes, 2018-2022 ). Jack De Sena( Callum36 episodes, 2018-2022 ). Sasha Rojen( Ezran35 episodes, 2018-2022 ). Jason Simpson( Viren / …31 episodes, 2018-2022 ). Racquel Belmonte( Claudia30 episodes, 2018-2022 ). Jesse Inocalla( Soren / …28 episodes, 2018-2022 ). Erik Dellums( Aaravos13 episodes, 2018-2022 ). Adrian Petriw( Gren12 episodes, 2018-2022 ). Luc Roderique( Harrow / …11 episodes, 2018-2022 ). Omari Newton( Corvus11 episodes, 2018-2022 ). Rena Anakwe( Janai10 episodes, 2019-2022 ). Jonathan Holmes( Runaan / …10 episodes, 2018-2019 ). Ian James Corlett( Ibis / …8 episodes, 2019-2022 ). Benjamin Callins( Terry7 episodes, 2022 ). Nicole Oliver( Zubeia6 episodes, 2019-2022 ). Nahanni Mitchell( Ellis6 episodes, 2018-2019 ). Ellie King( Lujanne6 episodes, 2018-2019 ). Cole Howard( Crow Master / …5 episodes, 2019-2022 ). Vincent Tong( Prince Kasef5 episodes, 2019 ). Dylan Schombing( N’than4 episodes, 2022 ). Peter Kelamis( Villads4 episodes, 2019 ). Kazumi Evans( Sarai / …4 episodes, 2019 ). Cecilly Day( Miyana3 episodes, 2022 ). Ana Sani( Lucia3 episodes, 2022 ). Sam Vincent( Lt. Fen / …3 episodes, 2018-2019 ). Ashleica Edmond( Kazi3 episodes, 2019-2022 ). Rhona Rees( Nyx3 episodes, 2019 ). Ben Cotton( Rex Igneous2 episodes, 2022 ). Bill Newton( Warlon2 episodes, 2022 ). Mark Hildreth( Chert2 episodes, 2022 ). Brenda Crichlow( Sunfire Queen2 episodes, 2019 ). Patricia Isaac( Queen Neha2 episodes, 2019 ). Jay Brazeau( Doctor1 episode, 2018 ). Michael Daingerfield( Ellis’s Father1 episode, 2018 ). Deven Mack( Yonnis1 episode, 2022 ). Brian Drummond( Dark Mage1 episode, 2019 ). Adrian Hough( Sol Regem1 episode, 2019 ). Vincent Gale( Ethari1 episode, 2019 ). Tyrone Savage( Rayla’s Father1 episode, 2019 ). Chris Metzen( Thunder1 episode, 2019 ). Ely Jackson( Rayla’s Mother1 episode, 2019 ). Zelda Ehasz( Queen Aanya1 episode, 2019)

Language English

Producers Josh Eckland. Aaron Ehasz. Devon Giehl. Richard Grieve. Iain Hendry. Neil Mukhopadhyay. Justin Richmond. Justin Santistevan. Delna Bhesania. Lauren Topal. Giancarlo Volpe. Tina Chow. Gigi Pritzker. Clint Kisker. Bill Oakley. Philip Hayes. Villads Spangsberg. James Stephenson. Lisa Thibault. Caleb Thomas

Production Bardel Entertainment. Madison Wells. Netflix.

Type Animation. Action. Adventure. Drama. Family. Fantasy. Thriller

Official site Official Netflix

Season 4

Episodes: 9
